Class ApplicationSupport<T extends io.dropwizard.Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.Application<T>
      • org.sonatype.goodies.dropwizard.app.ApplicationSupport<T>

  • public abstract class ApplicationSupport<T extends io.dropwizard.Configuration>
extends io.dropwizard.Application<T>
